headline: WeRide and Uber Launch Middle East’s First Fully Driverless Robotaxi Commercial Operations in Abu Dhabi, UAE
summary: ABU DHABI, United Arab Emirates, November 26, 2025--WeRide (NASDAQ: WRD, HKEX: 0800.HK), a global leader in autonomous driving technology, and Uber Technologies, Inc. (NYSE: UBER) today announced the launch of Level 4 fully driverless Robotaxi commercial operations in Abu Dhabi. This marks the first driverless deployment in the Middle East, as well as the first city outside the United States to host fully driverless operations on the Uber platform. (NYSE: UBER) today announced the launch of Level 4 fully driverless Robotaxi commercial operations in Abu Dhabi. This marks the first driverless deployment in the Middle East, as well as the first city outside the United States to host fully driverless operations on the Uber platform. headline: Will Uber’s (UBER) Abu Dhabi Robotaxi Launch Redefine Its Edge in Autonomous Mobility?
summary: Uber Technologies and WeRide recently launched fully driverless Level 4 Robotaxi commercial operations in Abu Dhabi, marking the Middle East's first such deployment and Uber's inaugural operation of this kind outside the U.S., supported by Abu Dhabi's first city-level autonomous taxi permit. This milestone highlights Uber's rapid progress in scaling autonomous mobility and delivery technologies across new international markets, reinforcing its ambition to lead in next-generation...

summary: We recently published 11 Stocks Jim Cramer Shared His Insights On. Uber Technologies, Inc. (NYSE:UBER) is one of the stocks Jim Cramer discussed. After Uber Technologies, Inc. (NYSE:UBER) earlier this month, the firm’s shares dipped by 5% even as it beat analyst revenue estimates of $13.28 billion by posting $13.47 billion. However, Cramer defended the stock […]
